text: Village of the Giants is a 1965 American science fiction comedy film directed, produced, and co-written by Bert I. Gordon. The movie is loosely based on H.G. Wells' 1904 novel The Food of the Gods and How It Came to Earth, but reimagined as a vibrant, teensploitation comedy with a distinct 1960s flavor. Category:Science fiction movies Category:Comedy movies
title: Village of the Giants
